case.name: In the matter of Flinders Ports Pty Limited (ACN 097 377 172) [2008] FCA 82 (8 February 2008)

citances.sentence: 4 I previously ordered under s 411(1) of the Corporations Act that a meeting of shareholders be held for the purpose of considering and, if thought fit, approving the scheme: see In the matter of Flinders Ports Pty Limited [2008] FCA 82.
